website_summaries.verdict: Nice all-around audio design. Especially clear and crisp sound for an outdoor speaker unit.
pros: Provides all-around surround sound with 360-degree design
Audio is clearer than expected for this type of speaker
White speakers are paintable to match other outdoor objects
cons: Ships with just one speaker, so price for two units is a little high

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy these speakers they will fail over time.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 4 of these for a brand new home, one speaker died after about 2 years and purchased a replacement (5th speaker). Then the other 2 started to go bad, no base, rattling ect. Contacted their support department and sent in for repair. Speaker came back weeks later but doesn't produce any base. I'm looking to replace all these speakers and basically throw away 5 speakers.
customer_reviews.author: AlisaOlivia2015

customer_reviews.title: Can't even compare to Klipsch
customer_reviews.text: Sold my house and included my Klipsch AW650 speakers. Bought these speakers for my new house because I wanted to try something new. These speakers sound like crap compared to the Klipsch ones. They sound hollow and don't nearly have the low end bass that the Klipsch has, and I don't even like having a lot of bass. The mid range sounds hollow and when they are turned up they just can't handle it. I had to do a ton of EQ adjustments to make them usable. A battery operated Bluetooth speaker would have been better than these for my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher B

customer_reviews.title: I am like one of you
customer_reviews.text: Whelp, I am like one of you, search and research outdoor speakers. I decided to buy them because of the speaker design. I have to tell you this, THESE SPEAKERS ROCK!!! They are on my roof eve and I have the Bass reflecting off of the wall. So far they have been up for a year and no issues. Everyone has said that my music for the pool is awesome because of those speakers. I bought 2, I am now going to buy one more just to fill out the roof line and so I can really piss off the neighbors..........
customer_reviews.author: Chopjaw

customer_reviews.title: WARRANTY ISSUE
customer_reviews.text: PURCHASED 4 OF THESE SPEAKERS BRAND NEW FOR AMAZON .2 SEPRATE ORDERS .2 OF THE AW6500 WORK FINE BUT THE OTHER 2 ARE SPITTING SPUTTERING AND CRACKING UP,THEY SOUND TERRIBLE .I PAID ALOT OF MONEY FOR QUALITY AMD WARRANTY. THE PROBLEM IS THAT NOONE WANTS TO HELP W THE WARRANTY .DEFINATIVE SAYS I MUST RETURN TO WHOM I PURCHASED FROM AND THAT COMPANY WILL NOT RESPOND . I WOULD NOT BUY DEFINATIVE TECHNOLOGY AGAIN .THEY MAKE THE WARRANTY VOID FROM ALL THE RED TAPE. I SAVED ALL THE ORIGINAL BOXES AND ALL THE INVOICES FOR NOTHING.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sound!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a set of speakers which I could use on my deck. I was hesitant to pay quite high price for this set, since I was thinking about buying a separate sub-woofer. Long story short- I am very pleased with the sound quality! The sound is exceptional. Outstanding highs and deep bass. I even decided not to purchase a sub! As a setup, I use an old panasonic boombox (stored in the basement) and a Bluettoth 4.0 receiver(bought on Amazon for $15) connected to it. Saved a lot of money;) If you want to buy a brand new receiver, you should look at something with 150Watt RMS per channel.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker, Beware of seller PROGroupAV (unauthorized dealer who doesnt respond to claims)
customer_reviews.text: Good speaker. BEWARE of PROGroupAV - If you buy from them you have a ZERO warranty as they are an unauthorized dealer. I confirmed this from Definitive Technology themselves. Google the issue, its well reported. A request from ProGroupAV yielded zero assistance so I am stuck with a <12 month old speaker that is useless. Be careful who you buy from, you have zero warranty unless you purchase from one of their authorized dealers.
customer_reviews.author: Dane B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Waited a couple months to write this but I have these speakers combined with a Polk Sub10 subwoofer, Definitive Technology SubAmp 600 and a Sonos connect amp. The sound is absolutely superb. These speakers are crystal clear, has the perfect tone balance and can fill my entire .5 acre back yard. It sounds just as good as my home theater system. I originally had these without the subwoofer and while the bass is good, you had to turn them up loudly to get the bass radiator pumping. The Sonos player is 55w/channel which is more than enough to bring these things to life. One thing to note is that they are extremely large, so measure before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Big Upgrade from OSD speakers.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my 6.5" outdoor speakers from outdoor speaker depot. I needed to get rid of the other speakers since they were bluetooth only and i needed to integrate with sonos. I now drive the Def Tech speakers with the sonos amp and couldn't be happier. This was a big upgrade. It almost feels like listening to my hi fi indoor setup. The amount of bass these speakers put out especially if you can place them in a corner is very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dyrkacz

customer_reviews.title: Sounded great but died early
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding outdoor speaker. Unfortunately one after just 4 years of use one is completely dead and the other one has a dead subwoofer. Thought I'd get more than 4 summers out of these. So not really 4 real years of use, more like 1.5 years since they are not used in the late fall, winter or early spring. Kind of a big disappointment. Guess I'll look for another company that has a more durable higher quality product.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisKN

customer_reviews.title: Good audio BUT rattles on stucco and grills fall out
customer_reviews.text: I own a pair of these and the audio quality is great; HOWEVER, these speakers rattle like crazy if mounted on an uneven surface (Like stucco). I had to buy sound dampening padding to put behind them to get rid of the rattle. The other problem is that the grills fall off if you play them fairly loud. It is worst if they are in sunlight because the sun melts the glue the holds the grill in. I was able to get them to stay in by applying my own glue but these are things Definitive should have thought about before they labeled these as outdoor speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: the best sounding speakers in this price range that I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I have installed a ton of these, both in door and outdoor. I am a professional av installation technician and these are the best sounding speakers (in this price range) that I have ever used. Durable and weather resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Sound amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We have two pairs of these outside. The sound quality for an outdoor speaker is amazing. Good amount of bass without needing a subwoofer. I have a Marantz home theater with zone two going to an Onkyo amplifier that then powers these speakers. Niles volume control inside the house just as you go outside door effectively controls the volume.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: They are set 12 feet apart and the sound is amazing. I am pushing them through a beringer europower ...
customer_reviews.text: Have the speakers on my home pointing to the back yard. They are set 12 feet apart and the sound is amazing. I am pushing them through a beringer europower 2500 and limited with a dbx pa 2 driverack. I am soon to recive another pair and will parallel them with the existing pair , off the same amp. The music im listening to is moderrn jazz to classic rock and country. The highs are clear and bass is good. Being outdoors bass is hard to get, but these speakers do a good job. I have these speakers running everyday and are pushed to just below cliping and have had no issues for the last month.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and these speakers are worth money!! Our friends come over are like "I've never heard outdoor sound so clear!" Speakers, like many things in life are a get what you pay for product. We tired "rock speakers" and other low cost options before buying the DTs. Its a great all around speaker and will handle plenty of power. Its low end is decent, but if you really want low end outdoors - don't expect it from anything but a true outdoor sub.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Newnam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speakers!!!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers rock! I have 4 on my back porch and they produce great quality music, hold up well to weather and can get very loud. Note that I primarily listen to country so I can speak to how well they do at base.
customer_reviews.author: TexAggie03

customer_reviews.title: Replaced one five years old (second one still going strong)
customer_reviews.text: The bass from these outdoor speakers is outstanding. Although my last one only lasted five years (the other is still going strong), the sound quality makes the replacement worth taking another chance. Make sure to reflect the bass side of the speaker against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: cnsf

customer_reviews.title: These sounded fine for a few months but have since sounded water ...
customer_reviews.text: These sounded fine for a few months but have since sounded water logged and staticky. These are partially covered and never left out in winter either. Sorry but I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DC2508

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've ever made!!!
customer_reviews.text: U will not regret buying these. They are so killer!!! They will make your music come alive and the bass response can't be beat. Previously had a pair of Yamaha speakers for my patio and I went to a friend's backyard party. He had music playing through these and I asked, "What kind of speakers were they?" When I found out they were these, I went home and purchased them. Trust, these are the "gazelles" of speakers!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Very good bass response
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are worth every penny! Impressive sound quality. Very good bass response, excellent mid and high range output. Unbelievable sound separation. I have them mounted under my deck on a concrete block wall; this certainly adds to the bass response. I am running them through a high end Yamaha receiver using 14 gauge speaker wire. These things are flat out top of the line!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Pantelleria

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sound at an Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: We use these both inside and outside of our restaurant, we have 6 total and the sound is fantastic! I would highly recommend to anyone and would vouch for their commercial use as we have used them at our establishment for over 2 years now without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dilya & Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor speakers with outstanding base!
customer_reviews.text: I used to install sound systems so I have been around allot of speaker solutions and I am amazed, these are the best outdoor speakers I have ever heard. These speakers are fantastic at getting good quality base even in an open area.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A.

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, but read manual for mounting location and take into account before buying!
customer_reviews.text: Nice loud speakers, easy to install. The only caveat on install is you have to take into account the bass side of the speaker...you need the sound to bounce off an object and ricochet back into the listening area. Not usually an issue when mounting indoors-but outside can be challenging. I had to have some aluminum fabricated to act as the object to ricochet the bass sound.
customer_reviews.author: DrakeGrad

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny - GREAT sound!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and installed a set of these speakers at the neighborhood pool. They are installed very high on posts without the help of a wall or ceiling behind them, and they sound incredible. Warm and rich with crisp highs. I received so many compliments on them that when my sister-in-law asked me to install some outdoor speakers at her house I knew exactly what I was buying. The speakers sound good without the help of a wall, but when they are placed under an eve and near a wall they sound even better. These are everything I could want in any speaker, but especially an outdoor speaker. They're not cheap, but they're worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua W. Kite

customer_reviews.title: Love Definitive!
customer_reviews.text: I chose these because we use Definitive for home theater and love them. These? they are even better! I'm blown away by the impressive sound these speakers have. if mounted correctly (instructions included) you have supper clear highs, voice and great lows. Because they are so great you find much price variance between Amazon, Crutchfied and Magnolia.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Interior wiring rusted away after 5 years
customer_reviews.text: Sounded great for 5 years installed outdoors, mounted to an outside wall without a large overhang above them - so very exposed to the elements. One of the speakers stopped playing, very difficult but opened the speaker (removing many small plastic covers to get to each screw) and found the inside wiring had rusted away. In the meantime a set of Klipsch 550 outdoor speakers is still going strong after 8 years in a similar outdoor location on other side of yard.
customer_reviews.author: S. Poxon

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome and a perfect fit considering they can stand up ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these speakers in my gym. They are awesome and a perfect fit considering they can stand up to the humid and hot conditions and even during the winter when it is colder. My gym is in a large warehouse so the conditions range all over the place. The sound is great and they are perfect for what I need. If I had a house I would definitely said he’s outside on the back deck.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They replaced a couple of Polk Atrium 45s that were a few years ago. Of course, that is not an apples to apples comparison but these are just awesome. They fill the backyard and the depth of sound is super impressive. I'm so glad I got these. I have 4 speakers powered by an Audiosource Amp-100.
customer_reviews.author: Twolabs

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: To whom it concerns, I loved these speakers for the summer 2018 I had them out. I did not take them out last summer though. Hung them up today and the speaker doesn’t work. Tried switching the wires on the receiver and still only one speaker works. Wish seller could assist. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Coralia Leyderman

customer_reviews.title: I can not say enough good things about these speakers or this company
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough good things about these speakers or this company. I had bought a pair of these around 3 years ago, and I just blew one over last july 4th holiday. The company replaced it no questions asked. They have a 5 year warranty! These are the best sounding speakers I have ever owned. I have now bought a spare one, so that if I do ever have another incident, I will not have to even go a day without! Just buy them!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal speakers!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been through my fair share of high end outdoors and I have these hooked up to my Denon 4520ci going to line in on my Sherbourn 4z-75 amp? Running them at about 60w of good clean pure power and I've never heard and outdoor Sp sound so incredibly good! I have the bass driver pointed towards the ceiling with the 6.5 and tweeter down and when I turn my system on while out back, I Just Smile and enjoy! Not to mention I picked these lil well big bad boy up at 150each on here Bc I wasn't wanting them shipped yesterday! Phenomenal speakers
customer_reviews.author: Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sounding speakers!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these speakers!!! I got a pair of them and cannot say enough about them. The bass is rich sounding the mids are amazing and the highs are excellent!!!! They are easy to install with the included brackets. They are worth the price without a doubt. I would recommend them to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark T.

customer_reviews.title: Very good outdoor speaker with Alexa Dot and amplifier
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing speaker. I bought a pair and wire it back in the basement to an amplifier than added an Alexa Dot and that was it. I can blow out my neighborhood if I wanted to. It has lived through the Georgia summer and rain just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P

customer_reviews.title: In a larger outdoor setting, these speakers are a fantastic value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I had a set of Bose 251 outdoor speakers at my previous house, and we bought a pair of these for the patio. They are noticeably better than the 251s in bass, clarity, and overall sound quality with louder volumes to fill an outdoor space. I also bought a set of AW 5500s for my deck, and given the choice between the 251s and the 5500s, I'd choose the 5500s hands down. The additional low end punch of the 6500s really shines in larger spaces. I love these speakers! I'm driving them with a whole house audio amplifier at 60w/channel, but initially had them running on a 40w/channel amp with great results.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for screened porch
customer_reviews.text: Using a pair of these for a dedicated outdoor music system on my lovely screened porch. I coupled them with astreaming lossless (flac) audio from my home server, and aamplifier. Speakers sound fantastic at all volumes that I would ever dream of using in my situation. Having 3-way speakers with a woofer that is large enough to matter really helps with sound balance outside. Highs are detailed and crisp. Overall sound is nicely balanced and clear for many types of music. Perfect for an outdoor setup where there can be plenty of masking noise coming from the surrounding environment.
customer_reviews.author: Laird

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, but poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The speakers sound amazing but I am not sure the quality is there. One of the speakers blew the first weekend we were using them and the volume was not too high. Also the girls pop loose in the corners and have to be pushed back in. Only had them for 2 months so far.
customer_reviews.author: TJ430

customer_reviews.title: Stop searching and buy these.
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought a pair of Bose Environmental 251 speakers, but the sound was super thin and took a ton of power to drive them. Picked up a pair of DT6500’s after reading the reviews and am not disappointed. Great full sound fills up my deck and doesn’t require a ton of power to drive them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound for outdoor / backyard.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased how great this sounded for my backyard / Pool areas. You will need an amplifier with 115W x 2 per channel to drive each speaker.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on Definitive Technology's reputation in the Audiophile community. I am not disappointed. These are easily the best outdoor speakers I have heard. Based on these, I think I should order some of their home speakers for my big system in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Steve J. Brock

customer_reviews.title: here is only ONE - not a pair.  Well made fantastic sound for a outdoor speaker
customer_reviews.text: looks and sounds nice, perhaps a tad large, would be nice if the connectors were recessed under a weather resistant cover though
customer_reviews.author: Zaphod Beeblebrox

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I have had these outside for almost a year now and have had no issues. The bass could be a little bit better but the sound quality is there.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Bad Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I was cheated and speaker which I have received is bad and no good. Sound is not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mubarak Abdulaziz Al Awadh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Outdoor Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these speakers to use on my outdoor patio and couldn't be happier. They are well made, were easy to mount and sound incredible with tight bass and nice mids and highs. If you're on the fence between these and ones from other brands such as Polk or Bose, I wouldn't hesitate to get these if you have the room for them as they are pretty large for an outdoor residential speaker.
customer_reviews.author: DinTemecula

customer_reviews.title: Large with plenty of pop!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, but I missed that only one speaker is included. Paid more, but got less than expected since most speakers come in pairs. Great sound, and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Carrera

customer_reviews.title: These things are fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These things are fantastic! I'm very impressed - I bought these to replace some smaller speakers that were installed but got blown out by a lightning strike. These quickly became some of the best speakers in my house and listening to music outside is a real treat. The bass is very full for a standalone speaker like this and the full range of sound sounds great. Smoking meats and listening to music has never been better.
customer_reviews.author: jluikart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Have had these speakers a year now and just remembering to write a review. Bottom line sound great and have held up outdoors in Phoenix AZ. After I first bought them I realized I wanted one of the speakers in one of two different locations depending on the area coverage I wanted. I emailed the company requesting they send me another bracket so I could easily swap the speaker back and forth...they quickly sent me one for free!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit picky and really wasn't expecting much based on the price and where I was mounting them in my yard. I was nicely surprised! They surpassed my expectations. We have a pretty big yard, and I spend my time on the other side of a pool and about 30ft from where these are placed and they do a very nice job. Set them up as a zone 2 with my amp and added a second volume control in line so I can adjust the volume without going in the house. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Marx

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality, with clarity even at higher volume. Superb bass! Although, I only have two placed in my backyard facing the yard, music can be heard around the corners. I've had guests comment on them and asked me where I purchased them. For now, the sound is fantastic. I have not dealt with severe weather to comment on the outdoor durability. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Prashant

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers, nice bass for outdoor speaker
customer_reviews.text: Installed a couple in my garage, very happy with the speakers. I am a semi-audiophile, appreciate good sound quality. These speakers have a good bass and clean treble, can handle being tuned up loud. Wish I had bought two of these for my deck, instead of the Polk Atriums I put out there.
customer_reviews.author: Simon D Willis

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: These speakers were as advertised, which I have to admit was a bit of a pleasant surprise. They project across our outdoor patio and pool area with exceptionally crisp, clear and inherently well balanced sound.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McRae

customer_reviews.title: Very fine outdoor speakers
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are great, with a bright clean high end and a little bit of midrange base. I have 4 on my deck connected to a Sonos Connect amp and it's a great combination.
customer_reviews.author: Cary L. AdlerSpa

customer_reviews.title: Right On!
customer_reviews.text: These things Rock! Show me better a equivalent and I’ll buy those too. Great with a good Bluetooth amp and iPhone outdoors
customer_reviews.author: Brian K.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Stops working after 2 years. Enjoyed them while they worked
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i had another brand of exterior speakers before, but the sound was really nothing compare to this. totally worth the price, the look is also very chique to combine with my pool and external area.(where we entertain a lot) nothing bad so far! and i have these installed for 6months already! at least no more complaint from my husband for bad sound when he plays the music loud.
customer_reviews.author: Julieta H.

customer_reviews.title: They sound great, and are able to project across the entirety ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not underestimate these speakers. They are monseters, in both size and performance. They sound great, and are able to project across the entirety of our backyard. Have used them several times to watch movies overnight. Will post pictures when my contractor installs them onto our new bbq pit!!
customer_reviews.author: Neal K. Bharadwaj

customer_reviews.title: If you're debating between 5500 and 6500, definitely go bigger!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great! Very clear with adequate mid range bass response. Don't expect these to be very full outside in a large area, though. I had them hooked up inside for testing and break-in prior to installing outside, and they sounds AMAZING inside. Definitely made me want better speakers for my home audio/theater system as well.
customer_reviews.author: Adam K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speakers! I own Def Techs in my media ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speakers! I own Def Techs in my media room, so I was expecting great sound...so far, so good. I'm hoping they will last outside.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: AW6500 speakers  sound great
customer_reviews.text: Install around deck and pool for several years now. Aw6500s sound great. These are 200w 8ohm speakers which need something like a Russound D850 for best sound.
customer_reviews.author: thomas davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound!
customer_reviews.text: We have two mounted in our backyard around our pool. They go louder than we would be able to put them due to neighbors within 200 feet. There has been no change in quality after rain storms. Easy to install. Purchase a good receiver!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Voorhees Menendez

customer_reviews.title: fantastic speakers
customer_reviews.text: I dont know how you could get a better sounding outdoor speaker. I am blown away by the bass as well as volume with clarity. My neighbor came over to ask it i had some subs in my yard as he could feel it in his house
customer_reviews.author: mike gusola

customer_reviews.title: No support if you have a question or problem
customer_reviews.text: My D.T. AW 6500 speakers are connected to zone 2 on my Denon AVR-X4100W. I set the crossover as close to the instructions as possible but the sound is horrible. It’s all bass, you can barely hear mids or highs. I sent a support request to D.T. almost 2 weeks ago, promptly received an automated response that someone will be in touch shortly - I have been waiting for that ever since. It’s been almost 2 weeks, nada. I would not recommend these, as right now I have a pair of useless $400 speakers on my patio that I need to take off and replace them with my old ones, a trusted pair of Klipsch....
customer_reviews.author: KHS

customer_reviews.title: Great range
customer_reviews.text: Tried the Bose, the Polk, this one has a proper range. Good deep, which the other two are lacking. Offcourse this one is considerably larger. I'd rather have one of those vs two of the others. My opinion.
customer_reviews.author: M-M

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor speakers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these 4 speakers used this summer, installed them myself and could not be happier about the sound quality. I connected these to 150W on-wall volume controllers bought from OSD. I was pleasantly surprised by the deep bass quality of these speakers. They are for an outdoor BBQ area and a central courtyard. They sound great even in the open BBQ area. I haven't even cranked up the volume knob more than half way since it may be too loud for the neighbors. One of my audiophile friends complimented on how nicely these speakers sound during a recent party. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Quocchuong J. Bui

customer_reviews.title: Rich full sound!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you mount them higher up (horizontally) under the eaves. They use the the eave of your house for extra bass. Ironic since they picture them horizontally. I wanted to originally position them angled at different directions but it didn't work out that way. The sound is fantastic for an outdoor speaker though so I am not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are incredible. They have a full sound with plenty of base and power. The purchase price was by far the cheapest after doing an extensive search on the web. I am extremely pleased and would recommend these speakers to anyone looking for a full, loud and clear sound in their patio.
customer_reviews.author: Great deal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound amazing. I've been hesitant to buy outdoor speakers cause the sound usually isn't as good as I like. That's not the case with these. They have smooth bass and good, crisp highs.
customer_reviews.author: Kent D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic, full range with great base as well, better than the Polk speakers I also have.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Outdoor Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, fills a good size yard with music. Much better low end than I had hoped for, certainly better than the others I tested, including Bose. Placing them under the eves likely helpd that as teh "football" bass radiates upward. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Smith

customer_reviews.title: By far the best outdoor speakers I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a couple of other sets of "top shelf brand" outdoors in this price range. Took a chance on these based on the presence of the passive radiator and the tendency for bass to completely disappear outdoors. Absolutely love these... If you're looking at something less expensive, buck up and get these... totally worth it. A bargain.
customer_reviews.author: James K Boutcher III

customer_reviews.title: awesome Outdoor Speakers
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are amazing. The sound quality and the base you get out of these speakers is incredible. I have recommended to several of my friends
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brzowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them, great clear sound. will be getting some more for my wrap around porch
customer_reviews.author: Kwublu

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LOOKING SPEAKERS AND WELL BUILT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT LOOKING SPEAKERS AND WELL BUILT. OPTIMISTIC FROM MY RESEARCH AND ALL THE REVIEWS I READ. HOPING MY YAMAHA RS700 HAS ENOUGH POWER FOR THE QUALITY SOUND I WANT.
customer_reviews.author: JROD

customer_reviews.title: Nice outdoor speakers
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding outdoor speakers that can produce a good amount of bass when positioned under an eave or overhang that reflects the sound downward toward the listening area. Two of these provide plenty of quality sound around the outdoor pool where I installed them with a 2x100-watt receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle76

customer_reviews.title: Great sound -- strong bass.
customer_reviews.text: We have a set of these for our backyard patio. Impressive sound and strong bass even in an outdoor space. Holding up well after years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Inge Grasdal

customer_reviews.title: Super sound and service!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound great! I had one of my AW 6500's fail after 2 years for some reason. (Michigan weather might not of helped) I was very impressed with Definitive's warranty. A nice guy named Chet took care of everything free of charge with no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Mark LaFont

customer_reviews.title: worked great used it on Apple AirPort Express Base Station and ...
customer_reviews.text: worked great used it on Apple AirPort Express Base Station and audio source 100 amp and Definitive Technology AW 6500 speakers to set up an air play.. now i can control my speakers from my iphone
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers for the outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, high quality outdoor speakers. The sound is awesome. And, they were easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Incredible speakers. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: These replaced a 10 year old pair of SpeakerCraft speakers that were outstanding. So good, in fact, that I didn't think these would make a noticeable difference, and I'm very happy to be wrong. What sold me, and what ultimately is the killer feature, is the separate bass output that aims up at my lanai roof, and it genuinely sounds like I have a subwoofer out there now. Incredible sound quality - solid lows, sharp mids, and crisp highs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McG

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Speakers
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are well made, sound is impressive for the size of the speaker, great base, excellent imaging, one of the better products that definitive technology has to offer.
customer_reviews.author: DSam

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are awesome! I mounted one outside to try and can easily be heard anywhere on my acre lot. Rich bass and clear mids. I just ordered a second to provide stereo sound. They easily rival my Klipsch indoor speakers. I recommended to a friend and he loves them also.
customer_reviews.author: CArb1031

customer_reviews.title: Definitive Technology AW 6500 Outdoor Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great little speakers. Awesome sound. Ample bass response due to large rear-mounted passive radiator. No need for subwoofer with these speakers. Easy to mount. Adjustable directional brackets. I bring them inside during the colder months and use them as satellite speakers for my home theater system.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Cary

customer_reviews.title: These have a nice balanced sound for outdoor speakers
customer_reviews.text: Replaced some Bose (junk) tha failed after only one season in WA state. These have a nice balanced sound for outdoor speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Baron5

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my outside Bose speakers and it just lighted things up with more punch and better highs.
customer_reviews.author: Triple G

customer_reviews.title: Amazing outdoor speakers.
customer_reviews.text: These are an amazing pair of outdoor speakers. Fill my backyard with fantastic sound no problem. Mounting was really easy too. I have them mounted under a 20'x20' covered patio facing back towards my house. Sound great and really impressive bass for outdoors. I was worried I would need a separate sub but no need.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Rodd

customer_reviews.title: I've recommended these to friends and they've been equally as happy
customer_reviews.text: These speakers rock. Installed them on our outdoor patio in Vermont and they've held up very well and the sound is unreal. I've recommended these to friends and they've been equally as happy. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark in VT

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor speakers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to go out on our patio where we just had a new Pergula put up. The sound from them is great for being outdoors. Normal speakers in an outdoor enviornment where there is so much space just sound hollow and more like a PA system from back in the days of high school. These bring great bass through the highs. Now I wish I would have done this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: M. O'Briskie

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sound
customer_reviews.text: Huge difference the sound is awesome a very nice upgrade from my old speakers
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Richard E. Procter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound from these def techs
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound from these def techs!!! Can't go wrong. I have two of them poolside with a yamaha Bluetooth receiver. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Halsey

customer_reviews.title: Pool music!
customer_reviews.text: These are great sounding speakers, not to mention I'm severely underpowering them. Easy install, the brackets are really nice and sturdy. Hung the speakers under the eaves of the house. Update 10/18/2014: One year in and they're still working and looking like new.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I mounted these speakers horizontally under the eves of my house and hooked them up to a Rotel RB-1070 power amp and a Bluesound Node 2i. All I can say is wow! Great detail and plenty of bass and this was on a windy day. Can't wait til they are fully broken in. Easily the best outdoor speakers I've ever heard. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sound From an Outdoor Speaker
customer_reviews.text: An outdoor space is a really tough place to make any speaker perform but Def Tech hits another home run with these! I installed a pair on my back covered deck and am thrilled with the crisp, clean sound and with surprisingly tight bass that I get from a metal outdoor speaker - truly impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for use in our family fast food business. Excellent delivery process.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is outstanding. Do not attempt to install with banana plugs, they will prevent you from being able to adjust the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with the sound after returning a pair of Klipsch ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after reading the reviews on Amazon. I was very pleased with the sound after returning a pair of Klipsch speakers. Very good sound including solid base. Not excellent but very good.
customer_reviews.author: M. Russo

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: One speaker still work great outdoors, the other one I can barely here the sound. With the amount of money I have paid for each one, this should not of happened.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speakers!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are crystal clear with awesome treble and bass!! Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Vick

customer_reviews.title: Love these speakers
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers! Full range sound, handling a powerful amp, very listenable at high levels - very detailed as well. Fully satisfied and planning to get a second pair for the pool area.
customer_reviews.author: HighTechUser

customer_reviews.title: Major bass
customer_reviews.text: They produce a lot of bass, the mount rattles when cranked up. I put in some rubber washers to help. I paired them with smaller yamahas for clear mids/highs and the combination sounds great. Covers my entire yard very nicely:)
customer_reviews.author: riv-iew

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely and completely satisfied with the purchase. I have a 30 x 30 U shaped patio with brick walls and half of it covered with roof. I purchased two speakers. They have a good base bump and clear high ends. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We really like t hem. We shall see as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound fantastic when connected to amp. These speakers complete my patio. You won't be disappointed. Happy I purchased
customer_reviews.author: jorge andrade

product_meta.title: Definitive Technology AW6500 Outdoor Speaker - 6.5-inch Woofer | 200 Watts | High Performance | Built for Extreme Weather | Single, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteThe Definitive Technology AW 6500 puts worry about sound quality and speaker resilience to rest with fully sealed speakers that perform wonderfully rain or shine. Its BDSS driver coupled to the racetrack-shaped, pressure-driven low bass radiator, and pure aluminum dome tweeter provide an accurate reproduction of vocals and instruments and rich, deep lows while limiting distortion. The speaker’s air and water-tight design and non-resonant, rugged PolyStone enclosures allow it to be fully exposed to the elements and still reliably deliver indoor speaker sound quality for years of outdoor listening enjoyment. Integrated galvanized steel mounting brackets and unique enclosure shape ensure a full 360 degrees of rotation. The speakers can be placed just about anywhere while directing the audio to reach everywhere.
feature_bullets: FEATURES THE SAME HIGH-QUALITY COMPONENTS USED IN DEFINITIVE'S INDOOR SPEAKERS. Get fuller sound and deeper bass with this high efficiency speaker

LOOKS GREAT, SOUNDS EVEN BETTER – The AW Series is equipped with DT’s Balanced Double Surround System (BDSS) drivers. This speaker has a 6.5" Mid/Woofer, a 1" Tweeter & a 5" x 10" oval pressure-driven low bass radiator for more accurate sound reproduction

ROCK YOUR PATIO, BACKYARD, OR POOL - No more average sounding music. You'll hear clear, high-definition sound across your open spaces. With powerful bass, low distortion and broad dispersion, don't be afraid to pump up the volume!

ALL-WEATHER PROTECTION – The fully sealed PolyStone exterior makes this speaker tough & durable so it can withstand the harshest weather conditions. It is moisture resistant and wear resistant, making it an excellent choice for outdoor use

VERSATILE MOUNTING & PLACEMENT – The Galvanized steel mounting brackets (included) give you 360-degree rotational flexibility for horizontal or vertical mounting. With endless mounting & placement options, you can set up this speaker just about anywhere

A CLASS APART – 25 years of constant innovation, relentless engineering, latest audio technology, and iconic intelligent designs have made Definitive one of the most trusted names in audio speakers and premium home entertainment systems

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars412 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
